snippet: The agreement to drop the terms “all natural” and “nothing artificial” from some products is included in a settlement of a class-action lawsuit.
abstract: Kellogg Company agrees to drop terms 'all natural' and 'nothing artificial' from some products in its Kashi product line as part of a settlement agreement ending a class-action lawsuit; plaintiffs said company used terms despite using several synthetic components.
lead_paragraph: The agreement to drop the terms “all natural” and “nothing artificial” from some products is included in a settlement of a class-action lawsuit.

headline.main: Kellogg Agrees to Alter Labeling on Kashi Line
headline.print_headline: Kellogg Agrees to Alter Labeling on Kashi Line
